question: You travelled by plane last week and your suitcase was lost. You have still heard nothing from the airline Company, write to the airline and explain what happened. Describe your bag and tell them what was in it and what they were going to do about it?
text: I am writing this missive to draw your attention to complaint no:112.I was travelling from Udaipur to New Delhi and when I reached the Indira Gandhi International Airport I was waiting for my luggage at the collection point but was not able to see it,then I lodged a complaint and the airlines confirmed I will get the revert in 2-3 days but its almost one week but still I have not received any notification from the airline's side.

Let me explain my luggage.It was an American Tourister bag.It has a weight of around 10 pounds besides it was in dark brown colour.Furthermore,one handle of the luggage was broken.Moreover,I have written a capital 'S'  on it with a black marker.Inside , there was my clothes as well as my pivotal college documents.
I will be grateful if the airlines investigate this case with the help of their special loss and found a team.My airline ticket number is DN0018.In case of any queries,feel free to contact me.
Hope to hear from you soon
